sen.e: At a young age he entered into priesthood as 公尋's disciple; he later served the Tendai-zasu (the head priest of Tendai sect) Jigen sojo who was confidenced by the Emperor Godaigo, and was appointed hoin (the highest rank in the hierarchy of Buddhist priests).
